alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:20PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cattaraugus, southern Erie and Chautauqua Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Chautauqua County, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, West Seneca, Jamestown, Lackawanna, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden, Orchard Park, Westfield, Lakewood, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Blasdell, Falconer, and Angola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 54 and 60. Interstate 86 between exits 6 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
